name: HttpCallTaskConfig
description:
HTTP_CALL tasks make HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH).

YAML Example:
  - taskName:
      call: http
      with:
        method: POST
        endpoint:
          uri: https://api.example.com/data
        headers:
          Authorization: "Bearer ${TOKEN}"
        body:
          field1: value

fields.name: Method
fields.description: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH)

fields.name: Headers
fields.description: HTTP headers (optional). Values can contain expressions: "Bearer ${TOKEN}"

fields.name: Body
fields.description: Request body (optional). Can be any JSON structure. Supports expressions in string values.
